snippet: High-voltage lines and utility poles were brought down, and a fire at an electrical substation was being investigated.
abstract: Federal authorities are investigating whether three attacks against power grid in Arkansas are linked, and utility officials are asking residents to remain alert to the threat of more trouble.
lead_paragraph: High-voltage lines and utility poles were brought down, and a fire at an electrical substation was being investigated.

headline.main: Power Grid Is Attacked in Arkansas
headline.print_headline: Power Grid Is Attacked In Arkansas
